data.title: Lots of stuff
data.text: This place is pretty cluttered with stuff so you have to have a lot of time to make sure and look at everything. Owner is very nice. I find some of the coolest things here.

data.title: doesn't offer collectibles
data.text:
My first impression of this place was how unfriendly the man at the front was.  He did not acknowledge us when we walked in or as we were leaving.  The place does have some beautiful items but it's chairs, furniture, art, lamps, china, etc.  We are more into collectibles and oddities.

The hours are:
Tue - Sat  11 - 6
Sun  1 - 5
